title: Alter Ego
overview: Suspense, Death and Love. Alter Ego is a high concept mystery drama series set in a unique world where death moves among the population to accomplish her task: touching those whose "last hour" strikes after that moment.In her hiding place, the international Slavator Bank, the many clones of Death only have one appearance. That of a stylish young redhaired woman. When the clones are among us, they take the form of their alter ego, which is different for each clone. Death is ruthless, attractive and unstoppable.
